title: my daily routine
content: I have a daily routine. I do everything according to this routing. I get up early in the morning. I wash my face. Then I have breakfast. after breakfast, I brush my teeth and go to school. in the afternoon, I do my homework. Then I play with friends. In the evening, I study for some time. Then I watch TV. after supper, I go to be. I have a daily routine. I do everything according to this routing. I have a daily routine. I do everything according to this routing.
